column4: hi guys, this is kind of strange, my sound was working fine on my GNOME but now I installed KDE and I don't have sound...any ideas on what I can check?  In the sound mixer everything is unmuted
does the sound come back when you run gnome again?

okay so it seems, my log on and log off sound works fine..i just heard it when I went to log out...but like if i want to say play music via the internet with say www.pandora.com  which uses adobe flash I don't hear any sound.
are you using pulseaudio?  IIRC there was a library libflashsupport that you needed to install if you use pulseaudio
